title: Gauntlets of fumbling
data:
**[English]()** • [中文（中国大陆）‎](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_fumbling/zh-CN "Gauntlets of fumbling/zh-CN")

| \[ [![Leather gloves.png](/images/9/95/Leather_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Leather_gloves.png)   \[ [![Padded gloves.png](/images/4/47/Padded_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Padded_gloves.png)   \[ [![Riding gloves.png](/images/e/ed/Riding_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Riding_gloves.png)   \[ [![Fencing gloves.png](/images/c/ce/Fencing_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Fencing_gloves.png)***gauntlets of fumbling |                                                               |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                               |
| Slot                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [gloves](/wiki/Gloves "Gloves")                               |
| AC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [1](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                          |
| Special                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | - [fumbling](/wiki/Fumbling "Fumbling")                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                               |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 50 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                              |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [10](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                   |
| Material                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [leather](/wiki/Leather "Leather")                            |

**Gauntlets of fumbling** are a pair of [magical](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item") [gloves](/wiki/Gloves "Gloves") that appear in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*. They are made of [leather](/wiki/Leather "Leather"), and have a [randomized appearance](/wiki/Randomized_appearance "Randomized appearance") when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification") - the default appearance associated with them is a pair of "padded gloves".[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Description](#Description)

- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [4 History](#History)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 GruntHack](#GruntHack)
  - [5.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.4 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 References](#References)

## Generation

Gauntlets of fumbling have a 9⁄10 chance of generating cursed with a non-positive enchantment.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

[Player monsters](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") on the [Astral Plane](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane") that do not generate with a [war hammer](/wiki/War_hammer "War hammer") have a 7⁄8 chance of [generating with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a random pair of gloves and a 1⁄5 chance of those gloves being gauntlets of fumbling, for an effective 7⁄40 chance (17.5%).[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

## Description

While worn, gauntlets of fumbling grant 1 base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and extrinsic [fumbling](/wiki/Fumbling "Fumbling"), along with a -3 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") penalty while [firing](/wiki/Firing "Firing") from [bows](/wiki/Bow "Bow").[\[4\]](#cite_note-4) Fumbling causes the hero to trip over items and make noise, among other effects.

## Strategy

- *Main article: [Fumbling](/wiki/Fumbling "Fumbling")*

Gauntlets of fumbling are one of multiple reasons why randomly wear-testing items to identify them is a [bad idea](/wiki/Bad_idea "Bad idea"). Cursed gauntlets of fumbling are considered a minor [trouble](/wiki/Trouble "Trouble") by the hero's [god](/wiki/God "God").[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)

## History

Gauntlets of fumbling first appear in [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0").

## Variants

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), a cursed -4 pair of gauntlets of fumbling is generated within the Chamber of Junk in the [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Lawful_Quest "Lawful Quest") at level creation. This also applies to [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

### GruntHack

In [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack"), gauntlets of fumbling set a character's [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity") to 6, as low dexterity in general is changed to also cause intermittent fumbling.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), gauntlets of fumbling grant 0 base AC, 1 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and fumbling while worn.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") gauntlets of fumbling can create [gauntlets of dexterity](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_dexterity "Gauntlets of dexterity") and vice versa.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 499](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/objects.c#L499)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 997](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mkobj.c#L997)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 289](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L289): *gloves are generated after weapon is determined*
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1574](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dothrow.c#L1574)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 235](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/pray.c#L235)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 479](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/pray.c#L479)

Gauntlets of fumbling

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[    [    [    [ 
gauntlets of fumbling
Appearance random
Slot gloves
AC 1
Special
  • fumbling
Base price 50 zm
Weight 10
Material leather

Gauntlets of fumbling are a pair of magical gloves that appear in NetHack. They are made of leather, and have a randomized appearance when unidentified - the default appearance associated with them is a pair of "padded gloves".[1]

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 History
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 GruntHack
    • 5.3 dNetHack
    • 5.4 Hack'EM
  • 6 References

Generation

Gauntlets of fumbling have a 9⁄10 chance of generating cursed with a non-positive enchantment.[2]

Player monsters on the Astral Plane that do not generate with a war hammer have a 7⁄8 chance of generating with a random pair of gloves and a 1⁄5 chance of those gloves being gauntlets of fumbling, for an effective 7⁄40 chance (17.5%).[3]

Description

While worn, gauntlets of fumbling grant 1 base AC and extrinsic fumbling, along with a -3 to-hit penalty while firing from bows.[4] Fumbling causes the hero to trip over items and make noise, among other effects.

Strategy

Main article: Fumbling

Gauntlets of fumbling are one of multiple reasons why randomly wear-testing items to identify them is a bad idea. Cursed gauntlets of fumbling are considered a minor trouble by the hero's god.[5][6]

History

Gauntlets of fumbling first appear in NetHack 3.0.0.

Variants

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, a cursed -4 pair of gauntlets of fumbling is generated within the Chamber of Junk in the Lawful Quest at level creation. This also applies to SlashTHEM.

GruntHack

In GruntHack, gauntlets of fumbling set a character's dexterity to 6, as low dexterity in general is changed to also cause intermittent fumbling.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, gauntlets of fumbling grant 0 base AC, 1 base DR and fumbling while worn.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, upgrading gauntlets of fumbling can create gauntlets of dexterity and vice versa.

References

  1. ↑ src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 499
  2. ↑ src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 997
  3. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 289: gloves are generated after weapon is determined
  4. ↑ src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1574
  5. ↑ src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 235
  6. ↑ src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 479
